response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $15,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your life or business. Considering its high quality and unique features, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. We are confident that this offer represents a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire something truly remarkable without breaking the bank. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 14000}
